data.title: Anchor Days
data.meta_description: Join us for one of Hope College’s Anchor Days — our open houses for prospective students — for an in-depth look at academic programs, off-campus study, student life and vibrant Christian character.
data.text:
First visit to Hope? Returning for another in-depth look? Either way, Anchor Days are an excellent option for experiencing our campus and meeting the people of Hope.

We are excited to welcome you for one of our on-campus Anchor Days. Each of our Anchor Days is designed to offer a comprehensive look at our academic programs, off-campus study, student life and vibrant Christian character. Family members are welcome to attend.

Fall Anchor Days

Friday, September 20

Friday, September 27

Friday, October 11

Monday, October 14

Friday, October 18

Friday, October 25

Friday, November 1

Friday, November 8

Friday, November 15

Friday, November 22

Sign Up for an Anchor Day

Anchor Day Schedule

Students and guests will have the option to choose from a variety of sessions and opportunities throughout the day.
